TopicTitle: Launch clamps only holds rocket from one clamp when using multiple

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: win 10 | CPU: Ryzen 7 2700x eight core | GPU: RTX 4070 TI | RAM: 16gb

 

Attaching the launch clamps to a rocket only the first placed clamp holds the rocket when going to launch causing the rocket to hang on the single clamp.

Edited September 23, 2023 by Anth12
